about.descriptionFirst: A year ago I started learning programming. I chose web development.
about.descriptionSecond: As a summary of my skills so far, I created this portfolio website and my own FireApp. I was inspired to write it by the need to digitize some processes in my current job.
about.descriptionThird: Getting more involved in the structure of software development, I noticed how important automation is. My attention has recently focused on expanding knowledge in the field of CI/CD. I also did not pass by cloud services indifferently. Wanting to test their operation, I created a simple REST API on AWS.
about.descriptionFourth: My professional experience means that I get along very well with my coworkers. In addition, I am excellent at meeting deadlines, as well as conducting talks with investors. Collecting requirements from them, I implemented them in the project to finally hand over the finished product to customers.

services.title: My services
services.description: I create websites and web applications. I guarantee you full responsiveness, friendly interface and optimization for SEO. If you need a website that will attract your customers, get in touch!

servicesSlider.designDescription: Intuitive and stylish interfaces that make your website user-friendly.
servicesSlider.developmentDescription: Usable websites and fully functional web applications to meet your requirements.
servicesSlider.copywritingDescription: SEO-friendly content tailored to your needs and requirements.
servicesSlider.seoDescription: Improving visibility and organic traffic through strategic optimization and keyword research.

works.title: My works
works.description: Projects that were created by me as a summary of the learning process.
